dishes.name: Chicken Seekh Kebab
dishes.description: Delicious minced chicken seekh kebabs grilled to perfection with aromatic spices

dishes.name: Rumali Roti
dishes.description: Thin soft bread perfect for wrapping

dishes.name: Fried rice
dishes.description: Bowl full of healthy nutrients sauted with rice and fresh herbs

dishes.name: Mutton Seekh Kebab
dishes.description: Yummy Mutton kebab with herbs and soft mutton keema

dishes.name: Chicken Tangdi
dishes.description: Easy Charcoal Grilled Tandoori Chicken Legs | A recipe for vibrant Indian Tandoori chicken Tangdi, made on charcoal grill

dishes.name: Afghani Tangdi
dishes.description: This Afgani Chicken Tangri is cut and cleaned is roasted to perfection. Chicken tangri kabab and Tangri chicken drumstick recipe made using chicken legs.

dishes.name: Chicken Tikka
dishes.description: Chicken Tikka (Murgh Tikka) is a popular North Indian starter. Boneless chicken pieces are coated with a spicy marinade and then grilled to perfection.

dishes.name: Afghani Tikka
dishes.description: Creamy, mildly spiced chicken tikka skewers baked to juicy perfection, finished with aioli and fresh herbs for a melt-in-mouth experience.

dishes.name: Tandoori Chicken
dishes.description: Full(8pc) Half (4pc) Tandoori chicken is a dish made from chicken marinated in yogurt and spices and roasted in a tandoor, a cylindrical clay oven. The dish is now popular worldwide. The modern form of the dish was popularized by the Moti Mahal restaurant in New Delhi, India in the late 1940s.

dishes.name: Afghani Chicken
dishes.description: Afghani chicken is a creamy, mildly spiced dish of South Asian origin, popular in Afghanistan and Northern India. It is characterized by its signature velvety texture and smokiness, which comes from the combination of yogurt, cream, ground nuts, and aromatic spices

dishes.name: Afghani Wings
dishes.description: Desi wings afghani flavour

dishes.name: Chicken Wings
dishes.description: Crispy Tandoor Baked Chicken Wings are so easy to prepare and you don't have to bother with all the grease from frying! A healthier yet delicious way to enjoy

dishes.name: Chicken Biryani
dishes.description: Moradabadi chicken biryani

dishes.name: Egg Biryani
dishes.description: Our Egg Dum Biryani is delicious, flavorsome and easy to make. Boiled eggs are simmered in a flavorsome biryani masala gravy and layered over delicately cooked eggs

dishes.name: Plain Rice
dishes.description: Plain Basmati Rice to complete your full meal

dishes.name: Jira Rice
dishes.description: Flavourful Jira rice for a full meal

dishes.name: Matar Pulao
dishes.description: Dum Mattar pulao for biryani rice cravings

dishes.name: Kadhai Chicken
dishes.description: This authentic punjabi kadai chicken features juicy chicken pieces in a smoky & spicy tomato onion gravy seasoned with homemade kadai!

dishes.name: Chicken Lababdar
dishes.description: Chicken Lababdar is a rich, creamy, and flavorful North Indian dish featuring tender pieces of chicken in a spiced tomato and onion gravy.

dishes.name: Butter Chicken
dishes.description: This finger-lickin' Butter Chicken is the dreamiest creamiest Indian curry that you can make in the comfort of your own home, even down to the iconic bold flavours. A taste you will never forget!

dishes.name: Tawa Chicken
dishes.description: Tawa Chicken is a popular Lahori dish where chicken quarters are marinated, cooked on a large skillet, basted in that same masala, and then finished off with a brisk Tawa seasoning on the top

dishes.name: Handi Chicken
dishes.description: This creamy, spicy, and aromatic boneless Chicken Handi or Handi Chicken is a taste worthy dish that to enjoy and wow your friends and family. Packed with desi handi masala and flavours!

dishes.name: Egg Curry
dishes.description: Egg curry is a comforting Indian dish of curried eggs. It is basically made with hard boiled eggs, onions, tomatoes, whole & ground spices.Egg curry can be a daily meal with light and mealful flavours.

dishes.name: Chicken Roll
dishes.description: Delicious chicken roll for a fast and quick meal for evening snacks.

dishes.name: Egg Roll
dishes.description: Delicious Egg roll packed with eggy flavours and veggies

dishes.name: Paneer Tikka Roll
dishes.description: Paneer tikka with roll to water your mouth with big pieces of tikka and veggie fillings.

dishes.name: Malai Chaap
dishes.description: n Malai Soya Chaap, the chaap pieces are marinated in a gravy-like mix of cream, yoghurt, spices, and herbs, which gives the characteristic creamy, mild taste.

dishes.name: Masala Chaap
dishes.description: Here is a finger-licking good Punjabi-style masala soya chaap recipe the ultimate vegetarian comfort food from North India.

dishes.name: Afghani Chaap
dishes.description: Afghani tikka chaap for rich and creamy taste for your kids and family.

dishes.name: Paneer Tikka
dishes.description: Paneer tikka featuring cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) and vegetables that are marinated in a spiced yogurt sauce and then grilled. The grilling process, traditionally done in a tandoor, imparts a smoky flavor and a charred texture that makes it a favorite appetizer.

dishes.name: Tandoori Roti
dishes.description: Fresh roti from tandoor

dishes.name: Butter Tandoori Roti
dishes.description: Fresh Butter tandoori roti maid of whole wheat

dishes.name: Dal Makhani
dishes.description: Dal makhani is a rich, creamy, and flavorful Indian lentil dish originating from the Punjab region. The name "makhani" means "buttery," which refers to the dish's signature use of butter and cream. The authentic recipe involves slow-cooking whole black lentils (urad dal) and kidney beans (rajma) for hours until they become tender and luxurious comfort.

dishes.name: Chole Masala
dishes.description: Chole Masala is an authentic North Indian style Chickpea Curry made with white chickpeas, freshly powdered spices, onions, tomatoes, and herbs.

dishes.name: Rajma Masala
dishes.description: ajma Masala is a delicious gravy made by cooking red kidney beans with onion, tomatoes and basic spices. Rajma Masala goes well with roti, chapati & rice

dishes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
dishes.description: Yummy delicious Paneer Butter Masala made with paneer in a creamy tomato-cashew gravy with butter, cream, and spices.

dishes.name: Kadhai Paneer
dishes.description: Kadai paneer delicious spicy paneer recipe made with fresh ground kadai masala, paneer, onions, tomatoes & bell peppers.Kadai paneer masala brings together earthy spices with the smokiness from kadai cooking, creating a complex flavor that's both comforting and exciting.

dishes.name: Matar Paneer
dishes.description: Matar Paneer a delicious combination of soft paneer and healthy green peas in a mild spicy tomato based gravy, is a treat to taste buds

dishes.name: Dum Aloo
dishes.description: um Aloo is a North Indian curried dish where baby potatoes are steam cooked in a delicious gravy. The word Dum means cooked with steam slowly while aloo soaks all the flavours

dishes.name: Veg Chowmein
dishes.description: Evening snacks with full yummy fresh plate veg chowmein!

dishes.name: Chicken Chowmein
dishes.description: Chicken Chow Mein is a perfect takeout! A satisfying one-pan dinner with chicken, vegetables, noodles, and the best homemade chow mein sauce.

dishes.name: Butter Naan
dishes.description: Soft delicious Fresh Tandoori Naan
